name: Easy as 123
description:
Easy as 123 v2.

A puzzle game that has a very easy task. Answer a simple maths question. The answer will always be 1, 2 or 3.

You only have a few seconds to answer before the clock runs out.

Boost your score by clicking on the bonus items that float across the screen, the more you click, the better your score will be. Every bonus item you click spawns extra bonus items, the faster you click, the higher the score will get. Franticly clicking bonuses can be dangerous though, don't get distracted and forget to answer the question before the timer runs out!

Watch out for the wee space sheep. Click on the poor wee space sheep to save them and earn big points. Watch out, if you don't save the poor wee sheep it will EXPLODE!

Playable in browser, or as download for Android and Windows desktop.

This is my first game, Please feel free to leave comments or suggestions. There is bound to a ton of bugs in it. I'll fix and update it as often as I can.

This game is completely free and has no advertising.

Hope you enjoy
